title: [Large-Scale] Integrated Instructional Design Model Mobile Microlearning Course Development

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary digital literacy and foundational understanding of social science concepts
context.additional_context: A social sector job competency enhancement course for current practitioners, enabling flexible learning through personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can design microlearning content independently by utilizing an ADDIE model-based instructional design process
Learners can achieve over 80% consistency between learning objectives, assessments, and activities using integrated instructional design tools within an LMS
Learners complete over 90% of 15-minute microlearning modules in mobile environments and develop self-directed learning habits
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
